page.title: 15GAINS PARK.
page.content: Gains Park is a private housing estate. It was started about 10 years ago and is located to the west of Shrewsbury on the A458(T). It was named after a house called Gains Lodge. The school for the children of this estate is called Oxon C.E. School, which was built before the estate. The school is on 2 sites, 1 on Racecourse Lane and 1 on the A458(T) which is the road to Welshpool. I think there should be a shop or supermarket on the site. There is a plan at present to build a Neighbourhood Shopping Centre. The local newspaper reports that building will commence immediately. There are several different types of houses, for example, detached, semidetached, detached bungalows, studio apartments and terraced houses.
